plot: Narrated by the old-timers of the town, 'Czech Daze' is a comic and heartfelt documentary about the colorful people of Clarkson, Nebraska and how they've kept their heritage alive with Polkas, Kolaches and yes, even a State Queen.
title: Czech Daze
plot_es: Narrated by the old-timers of the town, 'Czech Daze' is a comic and heartfelt documentary about the colorful people of Clarkson, Nebraska and how they've kept their heritage alive with Polkas, Kolaches and yes, even a State Queen.
